name: xyzw-token-manager
description: XYZW游戏Token管理器 - 支持Base64导入和WebSocket连接管理

scripts.build:zip: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../dist.zip ./*
scripts.build:zip-with-version: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../dist-$(node -p "require('./package.json').version").zip ./*
scripts.build:zip-with-date: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../dist-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).zip ./*
scripts.release: npm run build:zip-with-version && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") dist-*.zip --generate-notes

author: XYZW Team
